d:
This is a compilation of three published works: Straight-Eating Hole, My First Development Spot, and The Captain's Baseball Club! It's 151 pages long, with 138 pages of text and 13 pages including the cover and afterword! For this re-collection, we've reworked various sections and added about five new pages of illustrations.

https://www.dlsite.com/bl/work/=/product_id/RJ01515667.html

n: [Doujinshi] [sorry Art work (S-sorry)] Behind the Scenes Koshien
